feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:03 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 1:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
